member.name: T:EbookBuilder.Book
member.summary: The entire book, combining

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.Name
member.summary: The name of the book

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.Author
member.summary: Name of the author

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.Publisher
member.summary: Name of the publisher

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.Pages
member.summary: The pages that make up the book

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.CssFile
member.summary: The CSS File to use to style the book

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.TimeCreated
member.summary: The timestamp of when the book was assembled

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Book.Metadata
member.summary: Additional metadata of the book

member.name: T:EbookBuilder.Image
member.summary: An image used in the ebook

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Image.ImageID
member.summary: The ID of the image (used to link it to the page)

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Image.Extension
member.summary: The extension of the image

member.name: P:EbookBuilder.Image.FileName
member.summary: Extension of the file to write the image to.

member.name: P:EbookBuilder.Image.Type
member.summary: The type of item this is (Hint: It's an Image!)

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Image.Data
member.summary: The actual image data

member.name: T:EbookBuilder.Item
member.summary: Base class for all items that can go into an ebook

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Item.Name
member.summary: Name of the item

member.name: P:EbookBuilder.Item.Type
member.summary: The type of item it is

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Item.TimeCreated
member.summary: The timestamp the item was recorded from source

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Item.MetaData
member.summary: Additional metadata a source can freely add

member.name: T:EbookBuilder.ItemType
member.summary: What kind of item it is

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.ItemType.Page
member.summary: A page filled with textto be displayed

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.ItemType.Image
member.summary: An image resource used in a page

member.name: T:EbookBuilder.Page
member.summary: An individual page, part of the ebook

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Page.Index
member.summary: The index of the file. Used for building output in the correct order.

member.name: P:EbookBuilder.Page.Type
member.summary: The type of item this is (Hint: It's a page!)

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Page.Content
member.summary: The html content of the file. All datasources must provide a string value.

member.name: F:EbookBuilder.Page.SourceName
member.summary: The name that generated the source
